alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued October 27 at 2:01PM MDT until October 28 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Hard freeze temperatures at or below 28. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Friday, with the coldest temperatures around sunrise. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The lowest temperatures are expected near the Jordan River and less urbanized agricultural areas.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
